attributes.action: Make MP's accountable for wrongly informing the British public about brexit.
attributes.background: If brexit was a business deal for a corporation the managing director would be accountable for wrongly informing his share holders and made to answer for their wrong doing. I put it to you to make MP's accountable for their wrong doing and miss leading the  british public into something it was not.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "make MPs' accountable". MPs are accountable to their electorate.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like to happen.
